text:
Hey there, right now we don’t have a way to hide that folder and the templates from being accessible. I’ve shared this with the team. We see the use of such a functionality.

Unfortunately until we’ve got something implemented to solve for this use case Chad’s correct you can change the label on the theme to more clearly denote it to content creators. You could also similarly change the screenshot for the theme.
Thanks <@U38EZFVFE>, looks like the best thing to do is to rename the theme, and hide the templates underneath them.
Are you planning on using it in the future?
